message: Hello Bob! I have a great product I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I think the product is interesting, but I can only pay up to $100 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $110.  It's still a good deal for you considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I am still unable to pay more than $100 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $105?
